title: Suzumiya Haruhi no Shukusai Comic Anthology
description:
There's even more to be told of the antics of the SOS Brigade—under Haruhi's leadership the possibilities for fun and mayhem are endless! Join your favorite characters in this huge collection of brand-new adventures and illustrations from a wide range of artists and storytellers! Jam-packed with more time travelers, aliens, espers, and Haruhi than Kyon can handle, this anthology is the perfect addition to any collection!

Chapter list:
[spoiler]Volume 1: Suzumiya Haruhi no Kyouen (涼宮ハルヒの競演; 2009/3/24)
#Illustrations: Samura Hiroaki, Nanao Naru, Yasu, Miyashita Miki, Puyo
- Yoshizuki Kumichi
- Douman Seiman
- Kotone Ranmaru
- Itou Ryou
- Matsubayashi Satoru

- nino
- Hamayumiba Sou
- Sakurajima (さくらぢま)
- Shinbayagi

- Itokatsu

- Naito Takashi
- Fukuda Shinichi
- Igarashi Ran
- Tomonaga Ibuki (友永芽吹)
- Kubota Makoto

Volume 2: Suzumiya Haruhi no Shukusai (涼宮ハルヒの祝祭; 2009/7/23)
#Illustrations: Itou Noizi, Kaishaku, toi8
- Watanabe Wataru
- Suzumi Atsushi
- Narumi Naru
- Daioki

Volume 3: Suzumiya Haruhi no Kenran (涼宮ハルヒの絢爛; 2009/12/23)

Table of contents from the English release:
